org.shortbrain.vaadin.form.field

Class LabelField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.ui.AbstractComponent
      • com.vaadin.ui.Label
        • org.shortbrain.vaadin.form.field.LabelField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.data.Buffered, com.vaadin.data.BufferedValidatable, com.vaadin.data.Property, com.vaadin.data.Property.Editor, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeListener, com.vaadin.data.Property.ValueChangeNotifier, com.vaadin.data.Property.Viewer, com.vaadin.data.Validatable, com.vaadin.event.MethodEventSource, com.vaadin.terminal.Paintable, com.vaadin.terminal.Sizeable, com.vaadin.terminal.VariableOwner, com.vaadin.ui.Component, com.vaadin.ui.Component.Focusable, com.vaadin.ui.Field, Serializable, Comparable<Object>, EventListener

    public class LabelField
extends com.vaadin.ui.Label
implements com.vaadin.ui.Field, com.vaadin.ui.Component.Focusable
    A Label that is seen as a Field (obviously read-only). As it is read-only, a lot of Field stuff here is dumb.
    Author:
    Vincent Demeester
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
